summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Southwest Airlines, demanding passenger and other records for Ghislaine Maxwell for two time periods (1994-1998 and July 2019 onward). The document includes a request for non-disclosure to preserve the confidentiality of the ongoing criminal investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subpoena requests all records from Southwest Airlines for Ghislaine Maxwell, also known as Ghislaine Borgerson, for specified time periods as part of a grand jury investigation.

events.title: Scheduled Grand Jury Appearance for Southwest Airlines
events.description: Southwest Airlines is commanded to appear before the Grand Jury for the Southern District of New York to testify and produce records.

events.title: Issuance of Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office issues a grand jury subpoena to Southwest Airlines for records related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
Silvio J. Atollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued to Southwest Airlines on January 23, 2020, seeking all records for Ghislaine Maxwell from January 1, 1994, through December 31, 1998, and from July 1, 2019, through the date of service.

The investigation involves alleged violations of federal criminal law, including statutes 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 1594(c) (conspiracy to commit sex trafficking), 2422(b) (coercion and enticement), and 371 (conspiracy).
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested that Southwest Airlines voluntarily refrain from disclosing the existence of the subpoena to any third party to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.

The subpoena commands an appearance before the Grand Jury on February 7, 2020, but waives the personal appearance if the requested records are produced with a executed Declaration of Custodian of Records.
